abstract: Officials in Upper Brookville, NY, have been surprised at fact that skeet shooting is legal, which they discovered after prospective resident and skeet shooting hobbyist inquired at village clerk's office; Mayor Terry L Thielen has put repealing law at top of her agenda, but community seems largely indifferent to sport.
lead_paragraph: Officials in Upper Brookville, N.Y., recently discovered that its local code allows the sport, leading to a debate about whether the law should be changed.

headline.main: A Long Island Enclave Where Skeet Shooting Is Legal, to the Surprise of Village Officials
headline.print_headline: In an Enclave on Long Island, Backyard Skeet Shooting  Is Legal (to Officials’ Surprise)

snippet: Officials in Upper Brookville, N.Y., recently discovered that its local code allows the sport, leading to a debate about whether the law should be changed.
